training_quality_justification: Excellent serverless event processing implementation with comprehensive error handling, proper IAM least-privilege configuration, DLQ pattern, and complete test coverage. Demonstrates production-ready patterns for SQS->Lambda->DynamoDB architecture. Minor deduction due to runtime version inconsistency between IDEAL_RESPONSE and implementation that was identified in review.
critical_issues_description: Lambda runtime version mismatch: tap_stack.py uses python3.9 but IDEAL_RESPONSE.md specifies python3.11 per PROMPT requirements
author: mayanksethi-turing
